item.title: The First Blog!
item.description: Introduction Hello, World! üåç Welcome to the very first post on my brand-new blog, created with none other than Hugo! üéâ It’s been an exciting journey getting this site up and running, and I‚Äôm thrilled to finally share it with you. As a final year student, I‚Äôve always been intrigued by web development, and building this blog is my way of diving deeper into the world of static site generators. After considering a variety of tools, I decided Hugo was the best fit.
